rules_text: When Awestruck Wonder enters, search your hand and/or library for any number of cards named Awestruck Wonder and exile them. For each card exiled this way, conjure a card named Awe-Inspiring Wonder. Put one into your hand for each card exiled from your hand this way, then shuffle the rest into your library. [i](It’s a 4/4 artifact creature that costs {6} with “This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.”)[/i]
